00059 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00060 //
00061 // CLASS: uvm_config_item
00062 //
00063 // Internal implementation class.
00064 // Base class to represent a configuration setting.
00065 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00066 
00072 class uvm_config_item {
00073 public:
00074   friend class uvm_config;
00075   friend class uvm_config_mgr;
00076   friend class uvm_factory_rep;
00077   uvm_config_item(
00078     const std::string& instname,
00079     const std::string& field,
00080     uvm_component* inst_set_by,
00081     uvm_config_type type
00082   );
00083   virtual ~uvm_config_item();
00084   virtual uvm_config_item_int* as_int();
00085   virtual uvm_config_item_string* as_string();
00086   virtual uvm_config_item_object* as_object();
00087   virtual void print() const = 0;
00088   void print_match(
00089     uvm_component* inst_getting,
00090     std::string instname_req,
00091     std::string field_req
00092   ) const;
00093 protected:
00094   uvm_config_type m_type;
00095   std::string m_instname;
00096   std::string m_field;
00097   uvm_component* m_inst_set_by;
00098 };

00100 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00101 //
00102 // CLASS: uvm_config_item_int
00103 //
00104 // Internal implementation class.
00105 // Represents a configuration setting specified by set_config_int().
00106 // Stores the specified value as a sc_lv<4096>.
00107 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00108 
00114 class uvm_config_item_int : public uvm_config_item {
00115 public:
00116   uvm_config_item_int(
00117     const std::string& instname,
00118     const std::string& field,
00119     uvm_component* inst_set_by,
00120     sc_dt::sc_lv<4096> val
00121   );
00122   virtual ~uvm_config_item_int();
00123   virtual uvm_config_item_int* as_int();
00124   sc_dt::sc_lv<4096> value() const;
00125   virtual void print() const;
00126 protected:
00127   sc_dt::sc_lv<4096> m_val;
00128 };

00359 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00360 // Templated functions necessary to support get_config_int()
00361 //
00362 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00363 
00364 template <typename T> void uvm_convert_from_lv(T& v, sc_dt::sc_lv<4096> lv) {
00365   v = lv; 
00366 }
00367 inline void uvm_convert_from_lv(sc_dt::sc_logic& v, const sc_dt::sc_lv<4096>& lv) { \
00368   v = lv.get_bit(0);
00369 }
00370 #define uvm_convert_from_lv_int_type(t) \
00371 inline void uvm_convert_from_lv(t& v, const sc_dt::sc_lv<4096>& lv) { \
00372   sc_dt::uint64 u = lv.to_uint64(); \
00373   v = u;  \
00374 }
00375 uvm_convert_from_lv_int_type(bool)
00376 uvm_convert_from_lv_int_type(char)
00377 uvm_convert_from_lv_int_type(sc_dt::uchar)
00378 uvm_convert_from_lv_int_type(short)
00379 uvm_convert_from_lv_int_type(ushort)
00380 uvm_convert_from_lv_int_type(int)
00381 uvm_convert_from_lv_int_type(uint)
00382 uvm_convert_from_lv_int_type(long)
00383 uvm_convert_from_lv_int_type(ulong)
00384 uvm_convert_from_lv_int_type(sc_dt::int64)
00385 uvm_convert_from_lv_int_type(sc_dt::uint64)
00386 // and similarly for char, unsigned, ...
00387 
00389 
00390 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00391 // Templated functions necessary to support set_config_int()
00392 //
00393 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00394 
00395 template <typename T> sc_dt::sc_lv<4096> uvm_convert_to_lv(const T& v) {
00396   sc_dt::sc_lv<4096> lv = v;
00397   return lv;
00398 }
00399 inline sc_dt::sc_lv<4096> uvm_convert_to_lv(const sc_dt::sc_logic& v) {
00400   sc_dt::sc_lv<4096> lv = 0;
00401   lv.set_bit(0,v.value());
00402   return lv;
00403 }
00404 
00406 
00407 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00408 // Implementation of templated functions set_config_int() and get_config_int()
00409 //
00410 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00411 
00412 template <typename T> void uvm_config_mgr::set_config_int(
00413   uvm_component* inst,
00414   const std::string& instname,
00415   const std::string& field,
00416   const T& val
00417 ) {
00418   sc_dt::sc_lv<4096> lv = uvm_convert_to_lv(val);
00419   set_config_int(inst,instname,field,lv);
00420 }
00421 
00422 template <typename T> void uvm_config_mgr::set_config_int(
00423   const std::string& instname,
00424   const std::string& field,
00425   const T& val
00426 ) {
00427   set_config_int(0,instname,field,val);
00428 }
00429 
00430 template <typename T> bool uvm_config_mgr::get_config_int(
00431   uvm_component* inst,
00432   const std::string& instname,
00433   const std::string& field,
00434   T& val
00435 ) {
00436   sc_dt::sc_lv<4096> lv;
00437   uvm_config_item_int* b = get_config_int_internal(inst,instname,field,lv);
00438   if (!b) {
00439     return false;
00440   }
00441   uvm_convert_from_lv(val,lv);
00442   if (print_config_matches()) {
00443     b->print_match(inst,instname,field);
00444     std::cout << "Value: " << val << std::endl;
00445   }
00446   return b;
00447 }
00448 
00449 template <typename T> bool uvm_config_mgr::get_config_int(
00450   const std::string& instname,
00451   const std::string& field,
00452   T& val
00453 ) {
00454   return get_config_int(0,instname,field,val);
00455 }
